channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- chartjs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- chartjs

item.title: CVE-2023-6082|2024-08-02T08:21:17.294Z -- unknown -- chartjs
item.description: The chartjs WordPress plugin through 2023.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
